yuddhayen pida windina siya ratehi janathawata yamkisi manasika thrupthiyak gena dime aramunin mulyamaya ha pahasukam athin itha pahala mattamakadi wuwath kridakayan 127 denakugen yuth shakthimath kandayamak aasiyanu krida ulelata sahabhagi karawimata afganisthanaya samathwa sitiyi.pradhana pele jathyanthara krida ulelakata afganisthanu kandayamak sahabhagi wana thunwani awasthawa meya we.nowambar 12 wanida chinaye guwanju nuwaradi arambaena aasiyanu krida ulele di afganisthanaya boksin, mallawa pora, papadi, tayikondo, bara isilima ha krikat tharaga isaw sandaha sahabhagi weyi..
